content.title: Yo
content.subtitle: Classical Dance Competition
content.description:
Dance in India comprises of varied styles of dances.Classical Indian dance manages to evoke a rasa by invoking a particular bhava (emotion).Classical dancer acts out a story alost exclusively through gestures.Folk dances are numerous in number and styles,and vary according to the local tradition of the respective state,ethnic or geographic regions.
Anusthaan houses two categories:
1.Solo
2.Group

content.title: Spandan
content.subtitle: The Western dance competition
content.description:
Dance is the hidden language of soul.Dance is performed in many cultures as a form of emotional expression,social interaction or exercise,in a spritual or performance setting,and is sometimes used to express ideas or tell a story.
Spandan is a western dance competition and houses three categories.
1.Solo
2.Duet
3.Group
